TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSTrustChannel extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject, class System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract, class System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustContract
Public Class WSTrustChannel Implements IChannel, IWSTrustChannelContract

summary.span: Representa um canal que é usado para enviar mensagens do WS-Trust para um STS (serviço de token de segurança).

span.span: Represents a channel that is used to send WS-Trust messages to a security token service (STS).
